net.sf.jasperreports.engine.component
Interface XmlDigesterConfigurer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComponentsXmlHandler, SortComponentDigester, SpiderChartDigester
public interface XmlDigesterConfigurer

A digester configurer provides digester rules that apply to component XML schemas and produce component object instances out of XML fragments.

Version:
$Id: XmlDigesterConfigurer.java 4595 2011-09-08 15:55:10Z teodord $
Author:
Lucian Chirita (lucianc@users.sourceforge.net)
See Also:
ComponentsXmlParser.getDigesterConfigurer()

Method Summary
 void configureDigester(org.apache.commons.digester.Digester digester)
          Configures an XML digester by adding the rules required to parse component XML fragments.
 

Method Detail

configureDigester

Configures an XML digester by adding the rules required to parse component XML fragments.

Parameters:
digester - the digester to configure
